definition: variant of 馬德里|马德里[Ma3 de2 li3], Madrid
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: Madrid, a city of night-walking dancers and day-drinking scholars. A city of pleasure and pain.
sentences.chinese: 马德里，舞者夜行文人昼饮之痛并快乐城市。

sentences.english: So I made the four-hour trip from Zaragoza to Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 于是我花了四个小时从萨拉戈萨赶往马德里。

sentences.english: But if Aguero wants to go to Real Madrid, tough luck for us.
sentences.chinese: 但如果阿圭罗想要去皇家马德里，对我们来说是霉运。

sentences.english: Midori give life with her colors.
sentences.chinese: 而马德里赋予了我生命的颜色。

sentences.english: 2006 – Madrid Barajas International Airport is bombed.
sentences.chinese: 2006年的今天，马德里巴拉哈斯国际机场被轰炸。

sentences.english: As for the Madrid and London bombings, bad stuff happens.
sentences.chinese: 至于马德里和伦敦爆炸案，那是坏事发生了。

sentences.english: Ozil also served an assist to Ronaldo against Atletico Madrid in the Copa del Rey.
sentences.chinese: 厄齐尔同样在国王杯对阵马德里竞技时助工罗纳尔多。

sentences.english: The New Madrid Fault line in fact runs up along the Seaway.
sentences.chinese: 新马德里断层带实际沿着海道向上而行。

sentences.english: You see, madrid goes about its business as usual .
sentences.chinese: 你瞧，马德里照常进行工作。

sentences.english: No, yo estudio en la Universidad de Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 不，我在马德里大学学习。

sentences.english: There will be a flight departing from Madrid at 9:18 a . m . the next day .
sentences.chinese: 第二天上午9点18分有一个班机从马德里起飞。

sentences.english: How is the football match between F. C. Barcelona and Real Madrid?
sentences.chinese: 巴塞罗那和皇家马德里的足球比赛怎么样？

sentences.english: 1959 –Gina Lollobrigida and Bob Hope in Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 1959年，吉娜罗洛布里吉达与鲍伯霍普在马德里。

sentences.english: Real Madrid want to bring AC Milan striker Ricardo Oliveira back to Spain.
sentences.chinese: 皇家马德里希望把AC米兰射手奥利维拉带回西班牙。

sentences.english: Mandeni took the oozing blue liquid out of the slave’s hands.
sentences.chinese: 马德里从奴隶的手中接过了那泛着蓝光的液体。

definition: München or Munich, capital of Bavaria, Germany
